meanings.definition: The quality of being full of wonder or amazement.
meanings.sent1: The children gazed at the stars in wonderfulness.
meanings.sent2: The wonderfulness of the fireworks display left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's wonderfulness at seeing snow for the first time was adorable.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with wonderfulness as she explored the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent5: The wonderfulness of the sunrise painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The state of being wonderful or excellent.
meanings.sent1: The wonderfulness of her performance brought tears to the audience's eyes.
meanings.sent2: We were all amazed by the wonderfulness of the surprise party.
meanings.sent3: The wonderfulness of the cake made it disappear in minutes at the party.
meanings.sent4: His kindness and generosity truly showed the wonderfulness of his character.
meanings.sent5: The wonderfulness of the view from the mountaintop took our breath away.
